text: Donald J. Salls (June 24, 1919 - January 3, 2021) was an American football player and coach. He was the head football coach at Jacksonville State University from 1946 to 1952 and from 1954 to 1964. He was a Purple Heart recipient. Salls was born in Trenton, New Jersey. Salls died on January 3, 2021 at the age of 101.Alabama's Oldest Letterman, Don Salls, Dies at Age 101 ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football players Category:American football coaches Category:Sportspeople from Alabama Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:People from Trenton, New Jersey Category:American centenarians Category:Purple Heart recipients Category:People from Jacksonville, Alabama
title: Don Salls
